pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimates Output // This package is intended to speedup the process of creating model-comparing tables common in Macroeconomics. The function collection stores the estimates of several models and formats it to a table of the form estimate starred and std.err. below. The default output is LaTeX but output to CSV for later editing in a spreadsheet tool is possible as well. It works for linear models (lm) and panel models from the "plm"-package (plm). Two further implemented functions "descsto" and "desctab" enable you to export descriptive statistics of data-frames and single variables to LaTeX and CSV.
